website_summaries.verdict: Its sound won't blow you away, but the Eton Soulra is a durable and compact portable iPod/iPhone audio system that offers a built-in rechargeable battery and solar charging.
pros: Rugged, splash-resistant design geared toward outdoor use
integrated solar panel for trickle charging while outdoors
GSM-shielded so iPhone doesn't need to be switched to airplane mode
cons: Solar charging requires direct, outdoor sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for the product.😩
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. After less than 2 years the solar powering part couldn't even keep up with the unit playing without the ac adapter. My friend recomended eton. Way to expensive for the quality. Never buy anything from Eton again. NEVER I tried to get a replacement battery and spoke to a very rude lady from customer service. They don't sell the battery anymore, it is oem. Only manufactured by Eton. She suggested I buy the Rukus extreme. Yeah right. I don't think so.Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dock for the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dock to take along with me on a trip to Florida. The dock sounds nice for the price and the solar panel does its job, I only charged the dock once the whole time I was there for the week. The dock also is protected against dirt sand and water from getting to the speakers. This dock fully meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: buck3690

customer_reviews.title: Been so. id since I bought it. Take ...
customer_reviews.text: Been so.id since I bought it. Take it camping were there is no electricity, but a lot of sun. I would buy an adapter for the iPod/phone to plug it in the back because it can get hot in the case. They also sell a blue tooth version that's a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Gaspar Rafael Nunez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am still checking out the solar charging capabilities but I do want to comment on the "On" indicator. The half full battery light is the indicator that the unit is on. Very curious this. Otherwise it would get a five. You have to press the battery button. Quite a bit louder and clearer than I expected. Hope the overall great first impression lasts. Much louder and cleaner sounding than I thought it would be based on the other reviews. Stoked to get on the river with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Had

customer_reviews.title: Good for remote places!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound and will run forever with the solar. Great for the gazebo since we do not have electric out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a good sound with it and I like it a lot. It stays in my office now but got it for outdoor activities. The only flaw is that you need to leave it in the shade when you are using it because it causes my iphone to shutdown because it gets too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mccann

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for almost 2 years and I have noticed the following: * it doesn't charge via solar power * the sound quality is ok, but not great * the system is very unstable and can turn on and off at will I would not purchase another product from Eton in the future.
customer_reviews.author: fscond

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the beach. It was perfect. I was excited to finally have something that I could use every day and not spend tons of money on batteries! For us the sound was perfect. We weren't trying to blast it like we were at a party, but over the waves and the five of us it was perfect. Many others on the beach likes it and were going to look into purchasing nkw as well.
customer_reviews.author: Momtothebeasties

customer_reviews.title: Eton Soulra Soulra Powered
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a unit that would work almost anywhere, including on a boat, and not having to worry about the battery. This caught my curiousity at Amazon, and I ordered it. Could not be more pleased with the unit. After the initial charging, I have relied upon the solar feature to keep the unit charged. The sound quality is very good, it is easily transported from place to place, and on the boat it is great to listen to the music that we have placed on the IPOD. Don't think that I would risk taking it to the beach however.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Love it for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: This player works perfect for water aerobics whether I am exercising by myself or with a group of 30. Everyone can hear fine and on sunny days it's nice tp know the sun is providing the power.
customer_reviews.author: Elkae

customer_reviews.title: For the $$$ nothing better
customer_reviews.text: For the price i dont think there i a better speaker out there...The fact its solar powered, has a remote and has a tough rubber exterior is perfect for all of my outdoor activities. The sound quality is great and even in a wide open space it can still be heard several feet away. The ONLY negatives are if you switching between ipods/iphones its hard to tell if its on or not especially outdoors...and if you leave your Ipod/phone sitting in it its drains the speaker battery charging the I-P.
customer_reviews.author: Lysander Luansing Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It is dead after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2009 and used it for a few months. Then packed it in its original box and kept it there until recently when I needed to use it again. There is no sound coming out of it, although all indicators show that it is functional. I can manipulate my IPod through but this is it. The manufacturer failed to respond to my requests for support.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Repnikova

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I used it for the beach and it was amazing! The product is in great condition. Work great with ipod or iphone and charges my gagets! super happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheers

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this is such a great speaker set-up and it is also solar powered too so we go out on the boat and play the iPhone love it
customer_reviews.author: kat2ray

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Unit died after only a few uses. It initially worked ok, except when I used it outside on a hot day the iPhone overheated - so much for being a solar charger. Then, due to moving, I didn't use it for several months. When I later tried to use it it was completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it perfect for summer living - i use it outside all the time it even fell off the top porch and still works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie E. Brower

customer_reviews.title: good deal and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with a tinge of doubt in my mind. I thought the sound would be poor and battery life even worse. let it charge over night (supplied wall charger) Ive been playing it for 4 hours and the battery indicator doesn't show any sign of dying. There are some weird quarks and the remote control doesn't work at all. Note this does not work with the lightening connector on an iPhone 5. It does accept the 30 pin to lightening adapter but neither the iPhone 5 or 5th Gen iPod touch will fit in the docking area.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Romero

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product - Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product right before I left for vacation and it was one of the best purchases I have ever made! Not only is the sound quality outstanding (and much better than other Ipod players I have used in the past) but the solar charging of both the system AND the IPOD is a great bonus. I used it by the pool, on a boat, and on the beach so the water resistant featire was also very useful. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3...2 of this size that I have left at each of our family's home to ensure we always have music. We also have the XL at our home when we need portable music.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: This is the coolest thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: Without even having to initially charge my Soulra, I took it outside for a test run. Immediately, I was in love with the greatest purchase I've made in quite some time. The sound is GREAT for an iPod dock, it works with my iPhone or iPod... Definitely worth the investment. I love my Soulra!
customer_reviews.author: Ridi222

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first day I used it at the beach, ran all day with no problem off my iphone. The second day I had some issues, but I am assuming that my phone was having trouble finding a signal that day. Overall I think it is great and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBER9901

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ipod needs a little more protection than just a press fit piece of plastic otherwise nice
customer_reviews.author: sean p. cahill

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a 4 day jeep trip. Worked great. Keeps your I pod charged. Sound is not too bad for what it is, not my Bose by any means but for what I use it for it works good. I will be using it on a ten day raft trip in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The review
customer_reviews.text: This speaker set is pretty cool but the best part is that your iPhone can be completely enclosed so you can take it anywhere. You don't have to worry about your phone falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Alg351013

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This solar powered dock station is affordable, durable easy to use and stays charged all day at the beach. Great companion to any outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: william g seeley

customer_reviews.title: Soulra a success
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Soulra, and used it over the weekend. Excellent sound, and it is light and easy to carry. It has great battery life if your ipod is fully charged (so the soulra doesn't have to charge your ipod while it plays). Solar charging works great, as I had it out by the pool most of the day. I have not tested it near water, so I cannot speak to that, butit looks like the ipod is well protected by a clear plastic case, and the solar cover, when it is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the Bose system I used to use for way cheaper. It sounds better and has way more features. The solar power is a bit limited in what it can do but this product is definitely worth the price. The water resistant design is nice too for poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ranieri

customer_reviews.title: Louder than I Thought
customer_reviews.text: The solar part did not survive a week out in the northern Nevada Black Rock desert. I use it in my spare bedroom with my iPod docked in and it actually works great plugged into the wall. The sound quality is quite good and can get quite loud if you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: sid penance

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, bad design
customer_reviews.text: iPhone got too hot and shut down because it was sitting in the hot sun. Then it just stopped working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Yuba City IT

customer_reviews.title: Like listening to bad radio, terrible sound always
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and I have to say it has never worked, the sound is like listening to a bad radio, full of cracking noises, we called their customers service and it took me 30 minutes to get someone on the line, they are arrogant and they will tell you it is a great product regardless of how bad it works, terrible product period, do not waste the money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan SW

customer_reviews.title: Soulra
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase. Has good sound quality and can be pretty loud (won't blow the roof off, but loud enough for me). Nice design, very compact and easy to transport. Only thing I don't care for is if you have a black Ipod and the solar panel is open (which seems to be almost always if you want to access the Ipod) the Ipod can get very warm. Otherwise, I would defintely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: senorrobertoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this radio. Works great in my pool area.I would definately recommend this to a friend.Its great not having to buy batteries.
customer_reviews.author: BigB1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this to anyone, we used this unit on the beach & it worked great on solar charging.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Soulra Solar Powered
customer_reviews.text: The Soulra Solar Powered Sound System is magnificient. The sound quality is excellent. We enjoy listening to the music on my ipod while boating.
customer_reviews.author: happy smile

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice System
customer_reviews.text: The perfect iPod/iPhone system for being outside. Very sturdy and takes the worry out of running of power.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Faulted battery
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through two of these now and the rechargeable bettery won't charge in the sun. I'll send the second one back and that's it for me. Otherwise, it'd be such a great tool for those outdoorsmen.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. May

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more mobile alternative to my Bose sounddock which is kind of a pain to lug around while traveling especially on planes. Nice to buy a product that lives up to its hype. The unit is about 2/3 the size of the Bose, significantly lighter and more streamlined and of course solar option.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Mixed value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Soulra with one exception. My Soulra and Ipod Classic were returned to the Eton folks after the first use. The Ipod became so hot that I was unable to hold it, after 2-3 houra in the sun My Ipod no-longer functions properly, it will shut down by itself, without apparent cause. The Eton folks, very nice and responsive, say my Ipod works perfectly. It does not. I will replace it as soon as I can afford it. I would not buy another Soulra.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband on his birthday. We took it to the beach and it works wonderful!! He loves it!! I don't know that I have ever bought him a gift that he used as much as this! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey119

customer_reviews.title: I like Elton products but this one is not on par
customer_reviews.text: I like Elton products but this one is not on par. Every device I put in it got scolding hot. Had to trash it. I'm sure it's offf the market. Goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Nordeen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment on a 3 month delay
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my outdoorsy BF. He loved it at first, but here we are 3 months later and it no longer excepts a solar charge and won't power up at all. Great news though (insert sarcasm) Amazon won't exchange the item because it's after 30 days. Lesson learned from this experience Amazon doesn't back the products they sell and won't even exchange it... but lucky for me I can pay a restocking fee (really for a broken item) and they'll give me "some" of my money back. So my advice only buy this product if you have the $150.00 to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Used the Eton Soulra 1 time by the pool, sounded okay for a few hours. By evening it wouldnt recognize the ipod. I've tried everything to get it to work, no luck. Works okay if you use the AUX input but will not charge the ipod etc anymore. Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: We thought this product would be perfect for camping and were extremely disappointed with its' solar capabilities. It just did not work at all. We would line up solar cells directly in the sun and it would not play. It never charged. Bottom line- it only works with the AC adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M Crystal

product_meta.title: Etón Soulra Solar Powered Sound System for iPod and iPhone (Black)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWhere sound and sun meetProduct InformationThe Eton Soulra Solar Powered Sound System is a solar-powered chargingdock patible with iPod and iPhone. It features a highlyefficient Enhanced Monocrystal Solar Panel that can function in direct sunlightor cloudy conditions and uses a mercial grade laminent to provideextreme durability. It is also IPX-4 splash proof with aprotective cover for your iPod keeping it safe from accidental watersplashes. Enjoy up to 5+ hours of playbackfeaturing stereosound with full range speaker drivers and bass boost with the EtonSoulra Solar Powered Sound System.Product Features Enhanced Monocrystal Solar Panel Up to 5+ hours of playback (depends on audio volume) Works with iPod and iPhone Rechargeable lithium ion battery pack Rugged/rubberized case and aluminum body IPX-4 Splash proof from all angles Audio line input Battery charge indicator Stereo sound with full range speaker drivers and bass boostSpecifications Dimensions: 11.857"x 6.625" x3.5" (W x H x D) Weight: 3 lbs 7.9 oz. Power: AC power input DCpower (9.5 V) Compatibility: iPod Touch: 4th Generation(8 GB 32 GB 64 GB); 3rd Generation (32 GB 64 GB); 2ndGeneration (8 GB 16 GB 32 GB); 1st Generation (8 GB 16 GB 32 GB) iPod Nano: 6th Generation(8 GB 16 GB); 5th Generation Video Camera (8 GB 16 GB); 4thGeneration Video (8 GB 16 GB); 3rd Generation Video (4 GB 8 GB); 2ndGeneration Aluminum (2 GB 4 GB 8 GB); 1st Generation (1 GB 2 GB 4GB) iPod Classic 160 GB (2009) iPod 5th Generation Video (30 GB 60GB 80 GB) iPhone: iPhone 4 (16 GB 32 GB); iPhone 3GS (8 GB 16 GB 32 GB); iPhone 3G (8 GB 16GB); iPhone (4 GB 8 GB 16 GB) Includes Soulra Solar Powered Sound System Remote Control Protective Cover for iPod AC AdapterNote: iPod/iPhone not included.

AMAZON.COM
The Soulra offers versatile functionality with a touch of class. Named after the Egyptian Sun God, Ra, the Soulra is the first of its kind--a solar-powered sound system for iPod and iPhone. Masterfully engineered, the Soulra grabs the sun's rays with its massive solar panel and processes nature's energy within its soul to power and play your iPod/iPhone for your musical enjoyment. If you are poolside or at the beach, the Soulra offers an IPX-4 splash proof body. If you are indoors, the Soulra has an internal lithium ion rechargeable battery that will power and play your iPod/iPhone long after the party ends. A battery charge indicator allows you to see the battery level so you know when to put it back in the sun or plug it in for a quick charge. Stereo sound with full range speaker drivers and bass boost allow music to resonate as the artist intended. Remote control included for full control and convenience.

ETON SOULRA SOLAR POWERED SOUND SYSTEM FOR IPOD AND IPHONE
 * Solar powered charging dock, compatible with iPod and iPhone
 * Rechargeable lithium ion battery pack
 * Rugged/rubberized case and aluminum body
 * IPX-4 Splash proof from all angles
 * Audio line input
 * Stereo sound with full range speaker drivers and bass boost
 * Battery charge indicator
 * AC power input

The Soulra's space-saving design makes it easy to pack with you wherever you go 





SOUND BY THE SUN
Solar Power
Generate energy to power the Soulra by simply setting it under the sun. No need to hassle with batteries or power cords. Where the sun is, you'll have your music too.

Door opens to reveal solar panels. 

Audio Line Input
Simply plug any iPod or MP3 player into the Soulra and take your music with you wherever you go.
IPX-4 Splash Proof
The Soulra will endure water splashing from all directions. Meaning you can enjoy your tunes at the pool, fishing on the river, surfing at the beach, and during many more activities.



WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Soulra Speaker System, Remote Control, Protective Cover for iPod, AC Adapter
feature_bullets: IPX-4 Splash Proof: Protected against spraying water from all angles at 10 liters/min at a pressure of 80-100kN/m2 for 5 minutes
Four-hours of audio playback at mid-volume and continuous charging of iPod and iPhone in battery mode
Rechargeable Battery: Two cell lithium ion 2000mAh, 7.4V; 4-hour recharge time via AC; 10-hour recharge time in direct sunlight;
Two full-range speaker drivers with a total output of 11W
Solar powered charging dock, compatible with iPod and iPhone; Audio line input for connecting iPod shuffle, MP3 players, etc.
